article.title: Blanks Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness

tags.tag: Office of the Under Secretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness

article.text: Julie A. Blanks has been assigned as principal director and civilian personnel policy and director, Defense Civilian Personnel Advisory Service, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Personnel and Readiness, Washington, D.C.Â
